inventory.log: Explore and learn about the saku monster universe

landing.download: Download Now, Hatch Eggs, Earn Rewards Today!

intro-card.title: Intro
intro-card.paragraph: Saku Monsters transforms the way we collect in Web3, drawing inspiration from classic '90s RPGs and toys to create a groundbreaking experience.

phase-one.p-phase: During Phase 1 of the Saku Monsters experience, over 70,000 users competed against each other to take care of a Saku Monster egg and earn Saku coins.
phase-one.p-blue: Download Now, Hatch Eggs, Earn Rewards Today!
phase-one.p-green: Your egg needs love and attention on a daily basis, so make sure you take good care of it.
phase-one.p-orange: Each Saku Monster has its own unique traits, abilities, and personality.

grow-card.shop-paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus bibendum finibus metus scelerisque commodo. Praesent id mauris massa.
grow-card.grow-paragraph: Collect Saku Monsters by hatching them from Saku Monster eggs! There are 150 unique Gen 1 monsters to discover, each with their own characteristics and abilities. Visit the Sakulog to discover each monster and it's phases.
grow-card.collect-paragraph: Sed tristique pellentesque massa sit amet consequat. In tempus, purus quis rhoncus mollis, nunc erat finibus tortor, non viverra purus orci vitae nulla.
